paragraphs.name: 148d
paragraphs.text: What does connection mean to you Crooked Little Flower, Tremaine L. Loadholt , tigger porn , Anna Now , Todd Hannula 🤓 , Tamyka Bell , Gloria DiFulvio , Richard Palmquist, DVM GDVCHM CCHVM , Meg Barclay , Heath Houston , BHD , Michelle Stone , Wild Flower , Samuel Paden, marika bianca , Solitary Cook, Jessica Kaisk , Lizella Prescott, Elliot Nichols, Jewels, H. Nemesis Nyx, Clay Rivers, Michelle Stafford, Jules, Sherry Caris, Molly S Hill, David Moser, augustkhalilibrahim, JB, Sean Howard, Lisa Renee, Ezinne Ukoha, Deborah Foster 🍁, Mary and anyone else who has an idea.

Connection is feeding my grown daughter chicken soup one salty sip at a time and giggling together when a noodle slides off the spoon and waggles on the tip of her perfect chin. She’s always so strong except for now when she’s so weak, so I feed her slowly. Then she vomits on my foot and she says she’s sorry, but I don’t care because she’s my child and we are connected and I would vomit for her if I could.
paragraphs.name: e098

paragraphs.name: ef96

paragraphs.text:
Childhood’s memory:
Stars Wars action figures,
Bare chested, underwear, diving into the pool,
Rooftops, 
Crawdads in the creek,
Climbing trees,
Fields of corn, 
Drawing on each other’s backs,
Football pigskin style,
Sword fights with sticks,
Movies on HBO,
Riding bikes until…

13817d089228.title: Connection zaps us out and up from a lazy slumber, calls to our conscience to be included in a maze…

paragraphs.text: Connection zaps us out and up from a lazy slumber, calls to our conscience to be included in a maze of cerebral, electrical, impulses traversing the stardom of our extra terrestrial existences to return us to each other again and again.
paragraphs.name: b1f9

of window slamming
The quiet sway of laundry
caught in October breeze

Cricket chirps and humming
Tuneless songs as feet slip
into Nikes for a run.

paragraphs.text: Connection
paragraphs.name: b154

paragraphs.text:
Buoy in the storm,
I hold fast to you — 
you are the net that appears
under the ledge 
when I 
f a l l — 
you bring the fire and 
the pain — 
without you,
I am numb 
and untethered — 
drifting, lost and blind
in the tired darkness — 
with you,
I feel and hurt — 
I’m safe, I’m heard — 
with we; I am
strong —…
paragraphs.name: 9a3e

7e7ccd659899.title: alto these words of yours grabbed me and made me sit down and take a breath.

paragraphs.text: alto these words of yours grabbed me and made me sit down and take a breath. They soothed my spirit — they spoke to my soul — I honestly think this is one of your best — and that is saying something — phew! This is going on my wall to be treasured — thank you. You truly have a gift — I stand in ovation.

b21facbaf1ce.title: I relate to your poem and must say, the picture introducing it is quite effective.

paragraphs.text: I relate to your poem and must say, the picture introducing it is quite effective. I believe my trying to give Support to others in all that I do, without expecting in return, is what drives me each day. Some say I’m doing God’s work. How awesome is that? 😇
paragraphs.name: 7a96

paragraphs.text: I shall Oprah you now:
Connection can happen in an instant, but to sustain it over a lifetime requires devotion, patience, communication and a shitload of good memories you can recall in tough times.
paragraphs.name: 76ce

paragraphs.text: Now I require Oprah-like compensation for my efforts.
